channel.title: AP News - US News

item.title: Police find bag carried by gunman who killed UnitedHealthcareâ€™s CEO, say he likely fled NYC on bus
item.description: Police officials say the gunman who killed the CEO of the largest U.S. health insurer likely left New York City on a bus soon after fleeing the scene on a bicycle and hopping in a cab.

item.title: Crews recover the body of a woman from a Pennsylvania sinkhole after a 4-day search
Ex-police officer denies leaking confidential information to Proud Boys leader
